transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji namaskar sir.
Customer: Namaskar.
Executive: Bataye.
Customer: Sir main National RPC Cement bhai se baat kar raha tha aur main abhi maximizer leke baitha National RPC Sunpipe and manufacturer National RPC na ha bataye. Ji ji.
Executive: Sir actually mujhe baat karni thi Dynasty promoters private limited se to main call karta hu na to directly India mart se aapki company ko uth jata hai main manufacturer hu aap maximizer main leke baitha bhi hu main use karta hu India mart ji ji to mujhe meri call merge karwani thi Dynasty promoters se ye any time me kam karti hai.
Customer: Aap ye soch rahe hai ki koi other company se aap connect kare right?
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Main pehle ek India mart pe wo number hai main call karta hu to aapki company se hi call uth jata hai customer aapka good name kya hai sir?
Customer: Parvez Alam
Executive: Parvez ji Sonu baat kar raha hu main India mart se aapne pehchana hoga ki hamari video meeting bhi hui thi pehle ha ha ha ha mera personal number bhi aapke pass hoga na National RPC se aap baat kar rahe hai I think UP me hai aapka plant.
Customer: Ha ha ha ha yaad aa gaya Sonu yaad aa gaya. Ji ji ji ji thik hai. To kya hai na matlab ki koi other company ko na aap direct connect nahi kar sakte main aapko batata hu thik hai jo aap direct google pe unka company search kijiye thik hai nahi kuch nahi mil raha hai actually unka location to milta hai waha pe agar waha company me kisi office ka ya landline number mujhe number mil jaye to main baat hi kar lu.
Executive: Iske liye main guide kar sakta hu number to main provide nahi kar sakta hu thik hai kyuki ha direct number jo hota hai na wo provide nahi ho sakta hai sir lekin ha main baat karwa sakta hu aapki aisi baat nahi hai thik hai but aaj aaj aaj ke liye aapko hold karna padega bas ha kyuki abhi system nahi hai na mere pass to isliye main karwa nahi paunga baki na aap mera number number hai aapke pass ha ha check kiya hua aapne ha ek bar type kar lijiye main bata deta hu fir se ye wala number mera nahi hai actually customer care wala number hai isse direct aap mere se connect kar lete hai customer care ke dwara aap mera personal number likhiye batau main kya number hai 8860
Customer: 8860
Executive: 8710
Customer: 87 10 85
Executive: 85 87 886 0871085
Customer: 8860871085
Executive: Ha ha 8860871085 thik hai ji ji aap ispe na ek bar mere ko hi bhej dijiye aur company ke jo name hai na ya fir jo bhi ho aapke pass abhi photo bhej dijiye ya jo bhi hai thik hai to kal main ek bar connect kar lunga aapko morning me jate hi thik thik hai ok fir fir main aapko discuss karwa dunga ok ok thank you ok thank you
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to merge call with Dynasty Promoters.

- Unable to connect with Dynasty Promoters directly.



Resolution:

- Executive explained direct connection is not possible.

- Asked to search on Google for company details.

- Executive provided personal number for further assistance.

- Asked to send company details for call merge.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect in the morning.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call merge, direct connect, company details
